name: Johnny Masopust
title: SCADA Systems Administrator
bio: Hi, I'm Johnny Masopust, a recent graduate from Colorado Mesa University with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. During my time at CMU, I balanced academics, athletics as a collegiate wrestler for the Mavericks, and campus roles as a Resident Assistant and Desk Attendant. These experiences honed my leadership, problem-solving, and organizational skills.

I lead by example, valuing accountability and high standards. My approach is shaped by experiences with leaders who inspired me to embody the principles I expect from others. I'm excited to bring my skills, determination, and passion to a role where I can make a meaningful impact.

Graduating with a degree in Computer Science on a full-ride scholarship is my proudest accomplishment. This achievement reflects my academic excellence, athletic dedication, and the resilience of being a first-generation college graduate.

services.title: Web Design

services.title: Database Design
services.description: I am currently working on a custom database for Riverside Education Center to migrate their current google.
